Entries.Biography:
Faye is a villager living in Ridgeside Village. She is currently a waitress at Pika's Restaurant, but aspires to become a self-made successful fashion designer. She is an unlockable marriage candidate, meaning that she is not initially romanceable, but becomes so after her 8 heart event, if certain conditions have been met prior.

Faye is very friendly and can freely converse with many of the residents of Ridgeside. She has a clothing shop at her house where she sells clothes of her own design.

In her heart events it's revealed that she gets distracted easily whenever she gets an inspiration for a new fashion design, sometimes even forgetting to eat.

Haley.Heading: Haley
Haley.Description: Faye has a good relationship with Haley due to a mutual interest in beauty and fashion.

Emily.Heading: Emily
Emily.Description: Faye has a good relationship with Emily due to a mutual interest in beauty and fashion.

Bryle.Heading: Bryle
Bryle.Description: Faye does not get along well (at least initially) with Bryle, after a certain incident that occurred when Bryle first visited Ridgeside.
